title: Update admin login UI to use username + password

requirements.summary: Update admin login UI and admin session hook to submit both username and password to the backend login method, keeping session-token storage behavior unchanged and all text in English.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin login form includes both a Username and Password field and submits both values.
On invalid credentials, the UI shows an English error message indicating invalid credentials.
On successful login, the session token is stored as it is today and admin pages become accessible.

file_operations.description: Replace the password-only admin login form with a username + password form (two inputs) and update English helper/placeholder text accordingly; submit both values via the session hook.

Change the login function signature to accept (username, password) and call the backend login method with both parameters; preserve existing localStorage session token storage/expiration logic and keep an English 'Invalid credentials' message for unauthorized failures.
Ensure RequireAdmin continues to gate admin-only UI using the updated AdminLoginForm/session hook API (no behavior change beyond supporting username + password login).
